newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian weathermen apologize for bad forecast.
newsitem.headline: Belgian weathermen apologize for bad forecast.

text.p: Belgium's weathermen, in a highly unusual move, have formally apologised for getting the forecast wrong.

"The Royal Meteorological Institute wishes to offer its apologies to the inhabitants of the centre of the country who could not enjoy the bright spells we had forecast for July 9," the institute said in a statement on Thursday.
The weather was overcast yesterday and the weather in Belgium is in any case notoriously fickle.
